TopicTitle: Stuck at "Expansion Loading Complete!" on Linux Mint

Articles.Content: I've recently bought Kerbal Space Program and DLC on Steam but I am unable to get the game to finish loading. It gets to "Expansion Loading Complete!" and then my laptop completely freezes and I am unable to move the mouse or anything. I am running Linux Mint 19 and I wanted to know how I can solve the issue, if I need to provide more information let me know, thank you.
I've had this problem and it is fixed by  reinstalling ksp and/or the dlc. Hope this helps.
